description.fr: {%FightTurnStarted} {value:b,+}\_{aura:76,value:b} à un allié aléatoire. \--- Quand il est ciblé par un SORT ÉLÉMENTAIRE\_:\v Applique l'état du même élément. \--- Quand {%astral} est appliqué\_:\v {value:a,+}\_{aura:76,value:a} et consomme l'{%ELEMENTARY_STATE}. \--- {value:dcc,permil,+} aux DÉGÂTS de {%CRITICAL_HIT,plural:one}.
description.en: {%FightTurnStarted} {value:b,+}\_{aura:76,value:b} to a random ally. \--- When targeted by an ELEMENTAL SPELL: \vApplies the state in the same element. \--- When {%astral} is applied: \v{value:a,+}\_{aura:76,value:a} and consumes the {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}. \--- {value:dcc,permil,+} to {%CRITICAL_HIT,plural:one} DAMAGE.
description.es: {%FightTurnStarted} {value:b,+}\_{aura:76,value:b} a un aliado aleatorio. \--- Cuando es el objetivo de un HECHIZO ELEMENTAL:\v Aplica el estado del mismo elemento. \--- Cuando se aplica {%astral}:\v {value:a,+}\_{aura:76,value:a} y consume el {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}. \--- {value:dcc,permil,+} a los DAÑOS de {%CRITICAL_HIT,plural:one}.
description.de: {%FightTurnStarted} {value:b,+}\_{aura:76,value:b} für einen zufälligen Verbündeten. \--- Wenn er Ziel eines ELEMENTARZAUBERS wird:\v Wirkt den Zustand desselben Elements. \--- Wenn {%astral} angewendet wird:\v {value:a,+}\_{aura:76,value:a} und verbraucht den {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}. \--- {value:dcc,permil,+} auf den SCHADEN durch {%CRITICAL_HIT,plural:one}.
description.pt: {%FightTurnStarted} {value:b,+}\_{aura:76,value:b} a um aliado aleatório. \--- Quando ele é visado por um FEITIÇO ELEMENTAR:\v Aplica o estado do mesmo elemento. \--- Quando {%astral} é aplicado:\v {value:a,+}\_{aura:76,value:a} e consome o {%ELEMENTARY_STATE}. \--- {value:dcc,permil,+} aos DANOS de {%CRITICAL_HIT,plural:one}.
